subject: We Want Your Feedback
body:
DRM Marketing - We Want your Feedback








As part of our commitment to protecting your privacy, we are contacting you to announce a new tool that will allow you to identify more specifically what information you want to see from us. You can click HERE and create your profile and make your selections.

       
       If you no longer want to receive any emails from us simply click HERE to be removed from our database.

       Sincerely,

      The Marketing Group
      DRM Marketing
  6950 W. O'Bannon Suite 180 
  Las Vegas, NV 89117
